text: Charles Patrick "Pat" Roberts (born April 20, 1936 in Topeka, Kansas) is a former senator from Kansas. Before Roberts was a senator, he was a U.S. House of Representatives member and the chairman for the United States House Committee on Agriculture. On January 4, 2019, Roberts announced that he will not seek reelection in 2020. ==References== == References == Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:People from Dodge City, Kansas Category:Politicians from Topeka, Kansas category:United States representatives from Kansas category:United States senators from Kansas Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:21st-century American politicians Category:20th-century American politicians Category:Kansas Republicans Category:Kansas State University alumni
title: Pat Roberts
